attributes.action: not to force responsible dog owners to neuter and muzzle our dogs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we understand that the issue regarding people who purchase dangerous dogs to use as weapons needs to be addressed and we accept that attacks on people and children are not acceptable, but we do not accept being penalised because of a minority who refuse to raise their dogs responsibly. as responsible dog owners, we do not wish to see our dogs penalised when they have done nothing wrong and are kept under control and raised to be sociable with everyone they come into contact with.
